TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Configuration extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示适用于特定计算机、应用程序或资源的配置文件。

span.span: Represents a configuration file that is applicable to a particular computer, application, or resource.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置设置存储在配置文件的层次结构中。Configuration settings are stored in a hierarchy of configuration files. 类实例表示所有配置文件中的配置设置的合并视图，这些配置文件适用于特定物理实体（例如计算机）或逻辑实体（例如应用程序或网站）的所有配置文件。The class instance represents the merged view of the configuration settings from all of the configuration files that apply to a specific physical entity, such as a computer, or to a logical entity, such as an application or a Web site. 逻辑实体可以存在于本地计算机上或远程服务器上。The logical entity can exist on the local computer or on a remote server. 有关配置文件的信息，请参阅[配置应用](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/index.md)和[ASP.NET 配置文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01505090-9114-41a7-93ca-068e2283ed3d)。For information about configuration files, see [Configuring Apps](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/index.md) and [ASP.NET Configuration Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01505090-9114-41a7-93ca-068e2283ed3d). 如果指定实体不存在任何配置文件，则 对象表示 Machine.config 文件定义的默认配置设置。When no configuration file exists for a specified entity, the object represents the default configuration settings as defined by the Machine.config file. 您可以使用以下类获取 对象：You can get a object by using the following classes: - 如果你的实体是客户端应用程序，则为 类。The class, if your entity is a client application. - 如果你的实体是 Web 应用程序，则为 类。The class, if your entity is a Web application. 返回 对象的方法的名称以 "Open" 开头。The names of the methods that return a object begin with "Open". 你还可以生成一个配置文件，用于表示 对象中的配置设置。You can also generate a configuration file that represents the configuration settings in a object. 若要执行此操作，请使用以下方法之一：To do this, use one of the following methods: - 调用 方法来创建新的配置文件。Call the method to create a new configuration file. - 调用 方法可在其他位置生成新的配置文件。Call the method to generate a new configuration file at another location. 创建配置文件的方法的名称以 "Save" 开头。The names of the methods that create configuration files begin with "Save". > [!NOTE] > 若要启用对远程计算机上的配置设置的访问，请使用 Aspnet_regiis 命令行工具。To enable access to configuration settings on a remote computer, use the Aspnet_regiis command-line tool. 有关此工具的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET IIS 注册工具（Aspnet_regiis）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6491c41e-e2b0-481f-9863-db3614d5f96b)。For more information about this tool, see [ASP.NET IIS Registration Tool (Aspnet_regiis.exe)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6491c41e-e2b0-481f-9863-db3614d5f96b). 有关创建和访问 .NET Framework 中包含的内部部分的自定义配置设置的信息，请参阅 。For information about creating and accessing custom configuration settings other than the intrinsic sections included in the .NET Framework, refer to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类访问配置文件元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to access configuration file elements. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#31)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#31)]

para.span: 类提供对编辑配置文件的编程访问。

span.span: The class provides programmatic access for editing configuration files.

para.span: 您可以使用 Web 应用程序的 类提供的 "Open" 方法之一，也可以通过 类为客户端应用程序使用。

span.span: You use one of the "Open" methods provided by the class for Web applications or by the class for client applications.

para.span: 这些方法将返回 对象，后者又提供处理基础配置文件的方法和属性。

span.span: These methods return a object, which in turn provides the methods and properties that handle the underlying configuration files.

para.span: 可以访问这些文件，以读取或写入配置信息。

span.span: You can access these files for reading or writing configuration information.

para.span: 使用 方法或 方法来读取配置信息。

span.span: You use the method or the method to read configuration information.

para.span: 请注意，读取的用户或进程必须具有以下权限：

span.span: Note that the user or process that reads must have the following permissions:

para.span: -对当前配置层次结构级别的配置文件的读取权限。

span.span: - Read permission on the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level.

para.span: -对所有父配置文件的读取权限。

span.span: - Read permissions on all the parent configuration files.

para.span: 如果你的应用程序需要对自己的配置具有只读访问权限，则建议你将 方法重载用于 Web 应用程序。

span.span: If your application needs read-only access to its own configuration, it is recommended that you use the method overloads for Web applications.

para.span: 对于客户端应用程序，请使用 方法。

span.span: For client application, use the method.

para.span: 这些方法提供对当前应用程序的缓存配置值的访问，该配置值具有比 类更好的性能。

span.span: These methods provide access to the cached configuration values for the current application, which has better performance than the class.

para.span: 如果使用采用路径参数的静态 方法，路径参数必须引用运行代码的应用程序，否则，将忽略该参数并返回当前正在运行的应用程序的配置信息。

span.span: If you use a static method that takes a path parameter, the path parameter must refer to the application in which the code is running, otherwise the parameter is ignored and configuration information for the currently running application is returned.

para.span: 使用 方法之一来编写配置信息。

span.span: You use one of the methods to write configuration information.

para.span: 请注意，写入的用户或进程必须具有以下权限：

span.span: Note that the user or process that writes must have the following permissions:

para.span: -对当前配置层次结构级别的配置文件和目录具有写入权限。

span.span: - Write permission on the configuration file and directory at the current configuration hierarchy level.

para.span: -对所有配置文件的读取权限。

span.span: - Read permissions on all the configuration files.

related.span: 配置 ASP.NET 应用程序

span.span: Configuring ASP.NET Applications
Configuration Files
ASP.NET Configuration Files

summary.span: 获取应用于此 对象的 对象配置节。

span.span: Gets the object configuration section that applies to this object.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示应用于此 对象 配置节。

span.span: An object representing the configuration section that applies to this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性访问和更改在打开配置文件中默认定义的 `appSettings` 配置节。Use the property to access and change the `appSettings` configuration section defined by default in the open configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AssemblyStringTransformer As Func(Of String, String)

public: property Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ AssemblyStringTransformer { Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.AssemblyStringTransformer : Func<string, string> with get, set

summary.span: 指定一个函数委托，用于转换配置文件中的程序集字符串。

span.span: Specifies a function delegate that is used to transform assembly strings in configuration files.

value.span: 一个用于转换类型字符串的委托。

span.span: A delegate that transforms type strings.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使 .NET Framework 配置系统的使用者能够设置用于转换在配置文件中找到的程序集字符串的函数委托。This property enables a consumer of the .NET Framework configuration system to set a function delegate that is used to transform assembly strings found in configuration files. 如果项目面向的是早期版本的 .NET Framework，[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 使用此属性。[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] uses this property when a project is targeted for an earlier version of the .NET Framework. 此函数可确保在更新配置文件时，为 .NET Framework 的目标版本正确设置程序集字符串的格式。The function makes sure that assembly strings are formatted correctly for the targeted version of the .NET Framework when configuration files are updated.

related.span: 面向 Web 项目的 .NET Framework

span.span: .NET Framework Targeting for Web Projects

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了方便起见，配置设置包含在将相似设置组合在一起的部分中。Configuration settings are contained within sections that group similar settings together for convenience. 方法按名称检索配置节。The method retrieves a configuration section by its name. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法访问自定义节。The following example shows how to use the method to access a custom section. 有关定义用于存储 `CustomSection` 部分信息的类的完整示例代码，请参阅 类概述。For the complete example code that defines a class that stores information for the `CustomSection` section, see the class overview. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示由此 对象表示的资源是否存在相应的文件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a file exists for the resource represented by this object.

value.span: 如果该配置文件存在，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if there is a configuration file; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此 对象表示的资源从 web.config 文件中继承设置时， 属性也会返回 `true`。The property also returns `true` when the resource represented by this object inherits settings from a Web.config file. 当此 对象表示特定于位置的配置时， 属性返回 `false`。The property returns `false` when this object represents a location-specific configuration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Locations As ConfigurationLocationCollection

summary.span: 获取此 对象内定义的位置。

span.span: Gets the locations defined within this object.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含此 对象内定义的位置。

span.span: A containing the locations defined within this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 属性返回 `true`时， 属性才适用。The property applies only when the property returns `true`. 如果此配置继承了其所有设置，或未定义位置，则返回一个空集合。If this configuration inherits all of its settings, or no locations are defined, an empty collection is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NamespaceDeclared { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.NamespaceDeclared : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示配置文件是否具有 XML 命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the configuration file has an XML namespace.

value.span: 如果配置文件有 XML 命名空间，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the configuration file has an XML namespace; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置文件的格式为 XML 文件，但不需要 XML 命名空间。Configuration files are formatted as XML files, but an XML namespace is not required. 如果在 对象打开之后 `true` 此值，则该文件将包含命名空间引用。If this value is `true` after the object is opened, then the file contains a namespace reference. 如果在保存 对象之前 `true` 设置为，则会将命名空间引用添加到该文件。If it is set to `true` before the object is saved, then a namespace reference will be added to the file.

The root section group for this object.

summary.span: 将包含在此 对象中的配置设置写入当前 XML 配置文件。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the current XML configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 将包含在此 对象中的配置设置写入当前 XML 配置文件。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the current XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将保留自创建此 对象以来已修改的任何配置设置。The method persists any configuration settings that have been modified since this object was created. 如果配置文件不存在于 属性表示的物理位置，则将创建一个新的配置文件，以包含与继承的配置不同的任何设置。If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration. 如果在创建此 对象之后配置文件发生了更改，则会发生运行时错误。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs. > [!NOTE] > 当包含该配置文件的目录的 ACL （访问控制列表）中列出 "创建者所有者" 时， 的当前用户将成为该文件的新所有者，并继承授予 "创建者所有者" 的权限。When 'Creator Owner' is listed in the ACL (Access Control List) of the directory containing the configuration file, the current user of becomes the new owner of the file and inherits the permissions granted to 'Creator Owner'. 这会提升当前用户的特权，并为之前的所有者删除特权。This results in an elevation of privileges for the current user and a removal of privileges for the previous owner.

exception.span: 无法对配置文件执行写入操作。

span.span: The configuration file could not be written to.
-or-
The configuration file has changed.

summary.span: 将包含在此 对象中的配置设置写入当前 XML 配置文件。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the current XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法根据 `saveMode` 参数保留 对象中的配置设置。The method persists configuration settings in the object based on the `saveMode` parameter. 如果配置文件不存在于 属性表示的物理位置，则将创建一个新的配置文件，以包含与继承的配置不同的任何设置。If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration. 如果在创建此 对象之后配置文件发生了更改，则会发生运行时错误。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs. > [!NOTE] > 当包含该配置文件的目录的 ACL （访问控制列表）中列出 "创建者所有者" 时， 的当前用户将成为该文件的新所有者，并继承授予 "创建者所有者" 的权限。When 'Creator Owner' is listed in the ACL (Access Control List) of the directory containing the configuration file, the current user of becomes the new owner of the file and inherits the permissions granted to 'Creator Owner'. 这会提升当前用户的特权，并为之前的所有者删除特权。This results in an elevation of privileges for the current user and a removal of privileges for the previous owner. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法保存自定义节。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to save a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#2)]

exception.span: 无法对配置文件执行写入操作。

span.span: The configuration file could not be written to.
-or-
The configuration file has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法根据 `saveMode` 和 `forceSaveAll` 参数保留 对象中的配置设置。The method persists configuration settings in the object based on the `saveMode` and `forceSaveAll` parameters. 如果配置文件不存在于 属性表示的物理位置，则将创建一个新的配置文件，以包含与继承的配置不同的任何设置。If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration. 如果在创建此 对象之后配置文件发生了更改，则会发生运行时错误。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs. > [!NOTE] > 当包含该配置文件的目录的 ACL （访问控制列表）中列出 "创建者所有者" 时， 的当前用户将成为该文件的新所有者，并继承授予 "创建者所有者" 的权限。When 'Creator Owner' is listed in the ACL (Access Control List) of the directory containing the configuration file, the current user of becomes the new owner of the file and inherits the permissions granted to 'Creator Owner'. 这会提升当前用户的特权，并为之前的所有者删除特权。This results in an elevation of privileges for the current user and a removal of privileges for the previous owner.

exception.span: 无法对配置文件执行写入操作。

-or-
The configuration file has changed.

summary.span: 将包含在此 对象中的配置设置写入指定的 XML 配置文件。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the specified XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将在创建此 对象后修改的所有配置设置保持不变。The method persists any configuration settings that have been modified since this object was created to a new file. 如果配置文件不存在于所表示的物理位置If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the 属性，将创建一个新的配置文件，以包含与继承的配置不同的任何设置。 property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration. 如果在创建此 对象之后配置文件发生了更改，则会发生运行时错误。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs.

exception.span: 无法对配置文件执行写入操作。

span.span: The configuration file could not be written to.
-or-
The configuration file has changed.

summary.span: 将包含在此 对象中的配置设置写入指定的 XML 配置文件。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the specified XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法根据 `saveMode` 参数将 对象中的配置设置保存到新文件中。The method persists configuration settings in the object to a new file based on the `saveMode` parameter. 如果配置文件不存在于 属性表示的物理位置，则将创建一个新的配置文件，以包含与继承的配置不同的任何设置。If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration. 如果在创建此 对象之后配置文件发生了更改，则会发生运行时错误。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs.

exception.span: 无法对配置文件执行写入操作。

span.span: The configuration file could not be written to.
-or-
The configuration file has changed.

summary.span: 将包含在此 对象中的配置设置写入指定的 XML 配置文件。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the specified XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法根据 `saveMode` 和 `forceSaveAll` 参数将 对象中的配置设置保存到新文件中。The method persists configuration settings in the object to a new file based on the `saveMode` and `forceSaveAll` parameters. 如果配置文件不存在于 属性表示的物理位置，则将创建一个新的配置文件，以包含与继承的配置不同的任何设置。If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration. 如果在创建此 对象之后配置文件发生了更改，则会发生运行时错误。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#4)]

exception.span: 为 null 或为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: is null or an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SectionGroups As ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取由此配置定义的节组的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the section groups defined by this configuration.

value.span: 一个 集合，该集合表示此 对象的节组集合。

span.span: A collection representing the collection of section groups for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置节可组合到各个组中，以方便和添加功能。Configuration sections can be combined into groups for convenience and added functionality. 访问 属性以检索表示此 对象的节组的集合的 对象。Access the property to retrieve the object representing the collection of section groups for this object. 如果此 对象表示继承的视图，则将返回节组的合并列表。If this object represents an inherited view, the merged list of section groups will be returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Sections As ConfigurationSectionCollection

summary.span: 获取此 对象定义的节的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the sections defined by this object.

value.span: 此 对象定义的节的集合。

span.span: A collection of the sections defined by this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问 属性以检索表示此 对象的节的集合的 对象。Access the property to retrieve a object representing the collection of sections for this object. 如果此 对象表示合并的配置，则将返回部分的合并列表。If this object represents a merged configuration, the merged list of sections will be returned. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索 属性值并显示集合中的节数。The following example shows how to retrieve the property value and to display the number of the sections in the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ TargetFramework { System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ get(); void set(System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ value); };
member this.TargetFramework : System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName with get, set

summary.span: 在将当前版本之前的某个版本作为目标时，指定 .NET Framework 的目标版本。

span.span: Specifies the targeted version of the .NET Framework when a version earlier than the current one is targeted.

value.span: .NET Framework 的目标版本的名称。

span.span: The name of the targeted version of the .NET Framework.

value.span: 默认值为 ，它指示将当前版本作为目标。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that the current version is targeted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当配置系统将配置对象的层次结构序列化为 XML 时，它将检查该属性的值。When the configuration system serializes a hierarchy of configuration objects to XML, it checks the value of this property. 如果未 `null`属性，则配置系统将对每个配置节组和配置节执行版本检查。If the property is not `null`, the configuration system performs version checks for each configuration section group and configuration section. 配置系统还对标记为在不同版本中进行了更改的各个配置属性执行版本检查。The configuration system also performs version checks for individual configuration properties that are marked as having changed across versions. （有关详细信息，请参阅 。）配置系统还对配置节中的配置元素执行版本检查。(For more information, see .) The configuration system also performs version checks for configuration elements in configuration sections. 如果此属性的值为 `null`，则配置系统不在序列化过程中执行任何版本检查。If the value of this property is `null`, the configuration system does not perform any version checks during serialization.

related.span: 面向 Web 项目的 .NET Framework

span.span: .NET Framework Targeting for Web Projects

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property TypeStringTransformer As Func(Of String, String)
public: property Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ TypeStringTransformer { Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.TypeStringTransformer : Func<string, string> with get, set

summary.span: 指定一个函数委托，用于转换配置文件中的类型字符串。

span.span: Specifies a function delegate that is used to transform type strings in configuration files.

value.span: 一个用于转换类型字符串的委托。

span.span: A delegate that transforms type strings.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使 .NET Framework 配置系统的使用者能够设置用于转换在配置文件中找到的类型字符串的函数委托。This property enables a consumer of the .NET Framework configuration system to set a function delegate that is used to transform type strings found in configuration files. 如果项目面向的是早期版本的 .NET Framework，[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 使用此属性。[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] uses this property when a project is targeted for an earlier version of the .NET Framework. 当更新配置文件时，函数确保为 .NET Framework 的目标版本正确设置类型字符串的格式。The function makes sure that type strings are formatted correctly for the targeted version of the .NET Framework when configuration files are updated.

related.span: 面向 Web 项目的 .NET Framework

span.span: .NET Framework Targeting for Web Projects
